about_the_game:
Tanling Notes - The Princess of Peking Opera (with 39999 Lingyun coins) DLC contains the dress of the Princess of Peking Opera and 39999 Lingyun coins are attached to the skin.

Xiaoli Guoyun Princess of Peking Opera

The gymnast plays the pihuang drum with the long sleeves of Lao Dan's green clothes.
Special End Animation with Skin Gift [National Rhyme Peking Opera]!
With special voice and sound effects attached to the skin, the lines refer to the original repertoire design of Huangmei Opera A Dream of Red Mansions!


Peking Opera, as the quintessence of Chinese culture, is one of the important symbols of Chinese cultural tradition, the most representative and the most unique connotation of traditional cultural heritage.

Costume Design Reference to the Royal Princess in Beijing Opera Drunken Princess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 / AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
